Package org.jscience.mathematics.discrete

package org.jscience.mathematics.discrete
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.jscience.mathematics
    package includes subpackages for: Linear Algebra (Matrices, Vectors, Tensors) Geometry and Topology Algebraic Structures (Groups, Rings, Fields) Analysis and Functions Discrete Mathematics
    org.jscience.mathematics.discrete.graph
    package provides pluggable traversal algorithms for graphs with optional backend acceleration support.
